phrase: The picture contains a flow chart with light blue objects. The objects are rounded rectangles, regular rectangles, and rhombuses. The shapes stand for terminators, processes, and decisions. Dark blue lines connect all objects, with arrows in the direction to be followed. All objects are pointed at by at one or more other objects. Terminators and processes only point to one other object. Decisions point to two objects; the flow direction depends on the outcome of the decision. By starting at the Given terminator and following the processes and decisions, one may see how the algorithm described by the flow chart works.
